62-year-old man beats Chronic Shoulder Arthritis with Restructured Alkaline Water No surgery NO drugs. (This is my story) Please Share this Post

May 27, 2014

62-year-old man beats Chronic Shoulder Arthritis with Restructured Alkaline Water No surgery NO drugs. (This is my story) Please Share this Post

This is a story about me, how a person who has 35+ years in the health and fitness industry, was introduced to restructured alkaline water (kangen water). I was a major skeptic when my wife brought this water home, I already know how important water is for health, and water is just water right, I found out that statement is not true, and besides my wife said this is the only water we are going to have in this house so you have to drink it, so being a good husband I said yes dear.

Before I get started on how restructured alkaline water changed us and the lives of my family, I need to tell you a little about my wife and me.

As I said, my wife and I have been in the health and fitness industry for 35 + years, we were competitive, bodybuilders owned a powerhouse gym and have worked with thousands of people helping them from weight loss to rehabbing their injuries. In the late sixties I started out as a power lifter, which is where I was introduced to steroids, it was something I had to do to compete, little did I know what was going to happen to me from the side affects of using steroids.

I think you guys get an idea of our background.

Because of our profession, we were in, and the abuse our bodies went threw, I was a mess at 58 years old. High blood pressure, prostrate issues (major issues with this), a blown right bicep detached from my shoulders during a surfing accident. I was in pain 24/7 due to my chronic arthritis in both shoulders, the pain was so intense that I had to sleep on my back with my arms to my side, my wife would hear me moan at night because I was in so much pain.

Just driving a car and turning a corner one of my shoulders would lock up, the pain was so intense I would yell like a little girl.

Little did I know threw all this I also had a pre cancer condition due to smoking a pipe for years?

My son-in-Law who was diagnosed with MS at 26, at 29 he was on shots every day and mega drugs, the symptoms were still getting worse. Because of our profession, my wife was trying to find a way to help our son-in-Law by doing alternative medicine.

She over heard someone talking to someone that there is a new technology that came from Japan that has helped people with major medical issues, it has only been in the United States for a few years, the Japanese have been using it for decades in their hospitals, so being the research person she is , she looked into it, that is when she brought the water home for us to try and some for my son-in-law.

After three days of us all drinking kangen water I got a phone call from my son-in-law, he said how do I get my own machine, I asked why, my tremors are gone, tremors are one of the symptoms that MS people have and he slept all night with no pain. I told him I have know idea but I will find out.

To make a long story short, he has been drinking kangen water for about 3 years NO shots, NO, medication and lives a normal life, and yes, his doctor is blown away.

For me it took about 5 days before I felt something. I actually slept all night with no pain.

My passion has been surfing; I have been doing it for over 40 years, at 58 years old I had to stop surfing and had to completely stop going to the gym and do any kind of weight lifting, I was lost.

Over time most my symptoms went away, high blood pressure gone, prostate issues gone, shoulder issues gone, water is the essence of life, you can not live with out it, all your joints are lubricated by water, water will flush out any inflammation you have, your body is 75% water, your brain is 80% water, your blood is 90% water, it seems to me that water is pretty important don’t you agree.

The problem was with all of our training and education nobody ever taught us that there were different types of water and not all waters are the same.

I was never taught that the structures of water was the key for hydration and how it woks when you are training hard, and how fast you are able to recover after a hard training session, I never get sore, pain is not a good thing it means you damage your muscle fibers, that is why you have to wait 48 hours to train that body part, I don’t I can train the same body part the next day.

I believe proof is very important when you are trying to prove a point, well, here in my proof.

It has been three years that I have been drinking kangen water, I am 62 years old and doing things in the gym that most 62 year old men cannot do, I have never had any surgery done on my shoulders, I am still building muscles and getting stronger. I feel so good and getting stronger I feel like I can go up in weights quicker, not sure where it will end but I do not need to hurt myself.

If any of you would like to know the science behind all this you can contact me, I will explain it to you, recovery is the key to building muscle mass, it is all about how fast you can recover from a hard training session and get back to training hard again.

By the way kangen water is high 9.5 alkaline water, cancer can not live in an alkaline environment, nor can you by this water at any store even if it says alkaline water and even if it is from the health food store it still is not the same thing, if you would like to know why contact me drinknatureswater@gmail.com.

Proof is in the pudding, 62 year old man beats chronic shoulder Arthritis with the help of drinking restructured alkaline water ( kangen water) this video is what I am able to do today.

Restructured alkaline water helps the body to hydrate more efficiently.
